name: Tank Game Prototype (Jamal2911)
description:
You play as a tank with infinite ammo.
The goal is to kill all enemies on the map.

There are different types of Enemies:

Red tank
Medium shot, medium life

Blue tank
Quick shot, live a lot

Purple tank
Very fast shot, little life

Silver tank (Sniper)
Lethal ammunition, shoots very slowly
middle life

Controls: 

WASD - Basic control
Mouse - to aim
Left mouse button - to shoot SCREENSHOTS & VIDEOS
